about_the_game:
The Ghost on the Shore Artbook is a 85 page PDF from the art team behind the narrative exploration game, Ghost on the Shore. The art book provides a unique look at the development process of the game, with some of the original concepts for the title. Also featured is Riley's Journal, including each of her carefully curated pages, and the inspirations for their inclusion. We hope that browsing through the pages of the book helps bring you closer to the game and the team behind it.

The Artbook is located in the game install folder.
We strongly suggest to play the game first before taking a look at the artbook.
